pageData.title: Home
pageData.content:
Besides important basics like semantic and accessible HTML or a clean and maintainable CSS structure, I am very interested in topics like new browser capabilities (progressive web apps) and JavaScript, no matter if with or without framework.

And yes, I like to speak in public about the subjects above.

If I’m not in front of a computer I spend my days with my family, in the mountains, on skis or waiting for the wind.
pageData.excerpt:
Hello, my name is Nico.
I'm a freelance frontend developer and Google Developer Expert from switzerland.
